DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : HONG KONG
DOC.TEXT: Cathay Pacific Seeking Alliances with Chinese Airlines : Cathay Pacific Airways hasn ' t ruled_out the possibility of taking equity stakes in China ' s airlines , company Chairman Peter Sutch said.He said that in the past , Cathay hasn ' t seen the merits of entering into share swap or equity agreements with other carriers . But he added : " I think the situation is different with China and therefore we will certainly have another look_at it. " Sutch said that Cathay ' s interests could be damaged if a major European or U.S. carrier built a close alliance with one of the Chinese airlines .
